text: Carlos Soria (1 March 1949–1 January 2012) was an Argentine lawyer who became Governor of Rio Negro. A member of the ruling Peronist party, he had been the mayor of General Roca, until his election as governor of the province in October 2011. He died after being shot in the head during an argument at home with his wife. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Argentine politicians Category:Río Negro Province
title: Carlos Soria
